issue.title: [Python] Add deprecated wrappers functions to a pyarrow/compat.py module for 1.0.0 that will be removed later
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9130](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9130). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some third party projects (e.g. Dask) unfortunately have imported symbols from pyarrow.compat.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9130?focusedCommentId=17136680) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7447
